does anyone know how to use SSH?: i'm already on my university's server, i just want to know how to copy my file onto my user account at the university's server
not really, you need to clarify where your file resides

i telnetted to heart.cecs.csulb.edu and used SSH to log onto one of the machines called ecs306mac195.  i want to copy a file from my computer, specifically chapter1question1.cc into the home folder of "jguevarr" (my username on the remote machine)..
on your home computer, scp chapter1question1.cc jguevarr@ecs306mac195.cecs.csulb.edu:.
it says no such file or directory
chapter1question1.cc needs to be in the current directory, or you need to provide the full path to it

and I presume you have write perms in your home dir on ecs306mac195?
